channel.title: Ive read every tutoral, HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
Ok when i try to run it this is what it says,
[i]'Java'[/i] is not reconized as an internal or external command
operable program or batch file
Press any key to continue . . . _
K, well i do and it disappears, ive set up a server (or that No-IP thing, whatever it is,) i have the JDK thing,i have extracted it all USING WinRaR. Im really confuzzled, any help would be appreciated.
